model.chip_description: Works for LPC175x/6x (ARM Cortex-M3) Developed by FH- Technikum Wien, Institut für Embedded Systems, http://embsys.technikum-wien.at/ Heavily fixed and improved by Freddie Chopin, http://www.freddiechopin.info/ Modified by Cosik http://cosik-technicznie.blogspot.com/

field.name: MSEL0
field.description: Read-back for the PLL0 Multiplier value

field.name: NSEL0
field.description: Read-back for the PLL0 Pre-Divider value

field.name: MSEL1
field.description: Read-back for the PLL1 Multiplier value

field.name: PSEL1
field.description: Read-back for the PLL1 Divider value

field.name: CCLKSEL
field.description: Selects the divide value for creating the CPU clock (CCLK) from the PLL0 output.

interpretation.text: pllclk is divided by 1 to produce the CPU clock.

field.name: USBSEL
field.description: Selects the divide value for creating the USB clock from the PLL0 output.

interpretation.text: PLL0 output is divided by 6. PLL0 output must be 288 MHz.
PLL0 output is divided by 8. PLL0 output must be 384 MHz.
PLL0 output is divided by 10. PLL0 output must be 480 MHz
Internal RC oscillator as the PLL0 clock source
main oscillator as the PLL0 clock source
RTC oscillator as the PLL0 clock source
The main oscillator is not ready

register.name: LPC_SC_PCLKSEL0
register.description: Peripheral Clock Selection register controls the rate of the clock signal that will be supplied to the corresponding peripheral.

field.name: PCLK_ACF
field.description: Peripheral clock selection for CAN acceptance filtering.

register.name: LPC_SC_PCLKSEL1
register.description: Peripheral Clock Selection register controls the rate of the clock signal that will be supplied to the corresponding peripheral.

field.name: PCLK_WDT
field.description: Peripheral clock selection for uadrature Encoder Interface..

field.name: PCLK_TIMER0
field.description: Peripheral clock selection for GPIO interrupts.

field.name: PCLK_TIMER1
field.description: Peripheral clock selection for the Pin Connect block.

field.name: PCLK_CAN1
field.description: Peripheral clock selection for Repetitive Interrupt Timer.

field.name: PCLK_CAN2
field.description: Peripheral clock selection for the System Control block.

field.name: PCLK_ACF
field.description: Peripheral clock selection for the Motor Control PWM.

field.name: DMASEL08
field.description: Selects the DMA request for GPDMA input 8

field.name: DMASEL09
field.description: Selects the DMA request for GPDMA input 9

field.name: DMASEL10
field.description: Selects the DMA request for GPDMA input 10

field.name: DMASEL11
field.description: Selects the DMA request for GPDMA input 11

field.name: DMASEL12
field.description: Selects the DMA request for GPDMA input 12

field.name: DMASEL13
field.description: Selects the DMA request for GPDMA input 13

field.name: DMASEL14
field.description: Selects the DMA request for GPDMA input 14

field.name: DMASEL15
field.description: Selects the DMA request for GPDMA input 15

field.name: CLKOUTSEL
field.description: Selects the clock source for the CLKOUT function

field.name: CLKOUTDIV
field.description: Integer value to divide the output clock by, minus one

register.name: LPC_PINCON_PINMODE_OD0
register.description: Open Drain Pin Mode select register 1 enable (0-11)(15-26)(29-30) Port 0

register.name: LPC_PINCON_PINMODE_OD1
register.description: Open Drain Pin Mode select register 1 enable (0-1)(4)(8-10)(14-31) Port 1

register.name: LPC_PINCON_PINMODE_OD2
register.description: Open Drain Pin Mode select register 1 enable (0-13) Port 2

register.name: LPC_PINCON_PINMODE_OD3
register.description: Open Drain Pin Mode select register 1 enable (25-26) Port 3

register.name: LPC_PINCON_PINMODE_OD4
register.description: Open Drain Pin Mode select register 1 enable (28-29) Port 4

field.name: SDADRV0
field.description: Drive mode control for the SDA0 pin, P0.27.

interpretation.text: The SDA0 pin is in the standard drive mode.
The SDA0 pin is in Fast Mode Plus drive mode.

field.name: SDAI2C0
field.description: I2C mode control for the SDA0 pin, P0.27.

interpretation.text: The SDA0 pin has I2C glitch filtering and slew rate control enabled.
The SDA0 pin has I2C glitch filtering and slew rate control disabled.

field.name: SCLDRV0
field.description: Drive mode control for the SCL0 pin, P0.28.

interpretation.text: The SCL0 pin is in the standard drive mode.
The SCL0 pin is in Fast Mode Plus drive mode.

field.name: SCLI2C0
field.description: I2C mode control for the SCL0 pin, P0.28.

interpretation.text: The SCL0 pin has I2C glitch filtering and slew rate control enabled.
The SCL0 pin has I2C glitch filtering and slew rate control disabled.
There are no pending interrupts on Port 0.
There is at least one pending interrupt on Port 0.
There are no pending interrupts on Port 2.
There is at least one pending interrupt on Port 2.

register.name: LPC_GPIOINT_IO0IntStatR
register.description: GPIO Interrupt Status for port 0 Rising Edge Interrupt 1- interrupt generated (0-11)(15-30)

register.name: LPC_GPIOINT_IO0IntStatF
register.description: GPIO Interrupt Status for port 0 Falling Edge Interrupt 1- interrupt generated (0-11)(15-30)

register.name: LPC_GPIOINT_IO0IntClr
register.description: GPIO Interrupt Clear register for port 0. 1- cleared (0-11)(15-30)

register.name: LPC_GPIOINT_IO0IntEnR
register.description: GPIO Interrupt Enable for port 0 Rising Edge 1-enable (0-11)(15-30)

register.name: LPC_GPIOINT_IO0IntEnF
register.description: GPIO Interrupt Enable for port 0 Falling Edge 1-enable (0-11)(15-30)

register.name: LPC_GPIOINT_IO2IntStatR
register.description: GPIO Interrupt Status for port 2 Rising Edge Interrupt 1- interrupt generated (0-13)

register.name: LPC_GPIOINT_IO2IntStatF
register.description: GPIO Interrupt Status for port 2 Falling Edge Interrupt 1- interrupt generated (0-13)

register.name: LPC_GPIOINT_IO2IntClr
register.description: GPIO Interrupt Clear register for port 2. 1- cleared (0-13)

register.name: LPC_GPIOINT_IO2IntEnR
register.description: GPIO Interrupt Enable for port 2 Rising Edge 1-enable (0-13)

register.name: LPC_GPIOINT_IO2IntEnF
register.description: GPIO Interrupt Enable for port 2 Falling Edge 1-enable (0-13)

field.name: CR0 Interrupt
field.description: Interrupt flag for capture channel 0 event.

field.name: CR1 Interrupt
field.description: Interrupt flag for capture channel 1 event.

field.name: Counter Reset
field.description: reset on the next positive edge of PCLK

field.name: Counter/TimerMode
field.description: This field selects which rising PCLK edges can increment the Timer’s Prescale Counter(PC), or clear the PC and increment the Timer Counter (TC)

interpretation.text: Timer Mode: the TC is incremented when the Prescale Counter matches the Prescale Register.
Counter Mode: TC is incremented on rising edges on the CAP
Counter Mode: TC is incremented on falling edges on the CAP
Counter Mode: TC is incremented on both edges on the CAP

field.name: Count Input Select
field.description: When bits 1:0 in this register are not 00, these bits select which CAP pin is sampled for clocking.

field.name: CR0 Interrupt
field.description: Interrupt flag for capture channel 0 event.

field.name: CR1 Interrupt
field.description: Interrupt flag for capture channel 1 event.

Counter Mode: TC is incremented on rising edges on the CAP

Counter Mode: TC is incremented on both edges on the CAP

field.description: When bits 1:0 in this register are not 00, these bits select which CAP pin is sampled for clocking.

field.name: Counter/TimerMode

Counter Mode: TC is incremented on rising edges on the CAP

interpretation.text: TInterrupt flag for PWM match channel 0
TInterrupt flag for PWM match channel 1
TInterrupt flag for PWM match channel 2
TInterrupt flag for PWM match channel 3
TInterrupt flag for PWM match channel 4
TInterrupt flag for PWM match channel 5
TInterrupt flag for PWM match channel 6
Enable - PWM Timer Counter and PWM Prescale Counter
reset on the next positive edge of PCLK.
Counter mode - rising edges on PCAP
Counter mode - falling edges on PCAP
Counter mode - both edges on PCAP

field.name: ABEOIntEn
field.description: Enables the end of auto-baud interrupt

field.name: ABTOIntEn
field.description: Enables the end of auto-baud time-out interrupt.

interpretation.text: he UARTn receiver FIFO is empty.
The UARTn receiver FIFO is not empty.
UnTHR and/or the UnTSR contains valid data.
UnTHR and the UnTSR are empty.
RBR contains no UART RX errors or UnFCR[0]=0.
UARTn RBR contains at least one UARTn RX error.

field.name: ABEOIntClr
field.description: End of auto-baud interrupt clear bit

field.name: ABEOIntEn
field.description: Enables the end of auto-baud interrupt

field.name: ABEOIntClr
field.description: End of auto-baud interrupt clear bit

interpretation.text: second clock edge of the SCK
Disable Rx FIFO is at least half full Interrupt
Enable Rx FIFO is at least half full Interrupt
Disable Tx FIFO is at least half empty Interrupt
Enable Tx FIFO is at least half empty Interrupt
Rx FIFO is at least half full
Tx FIFO is at least half empty

field.name: RORIC
field.description: clear frame was received when RxFIFO was full interrupt.

field.name: RTIC
field.description: clear Rx FIFO was not empty and has not been read for a timeout period interrupt.

interpretation.text: Disable Rx FIFO is at least half full Interrupt
Enable Rx FIFO is at least half full Interrupt
Disable Tx FIFO is at least half empty Interrupt
Enable Tx FIFO is at least half empty Interrupt
Rx FIFO is at least half full
Tx FIFO is at least half empty

field.name: RORIC
field.description: clear frame was received when RxFIFO was full interrupt.

field.name: RTIC
field.description: clear Rx FIFO was not empty and has not been read for a timeout period interrupt.

field.name: Address
field.description: I2C device address for slave mode.

register.name: LPC_I2C0_I2SCLH
register.description: I2C SCL HIGH duty cycle register

field.name: SCLH
field.description: Count for SCL HIGH time period selection

register.name: LPC_I2C0_I2SCLL
register.description: I2C SCL Low duty cycle register

field.name: SCLL
field.description: Count for SCL low time period selection.

interpretation.text: nterrupt will only be generated no one of the four address I2ADR0 through I2ADR3.
interrupt will be generated on ANY address received.

field.description: I2C device address for slave mode.

field.description: I2C device address for slave mode.

field.description: This register holds contents of the 8 MSBs of the I2DAT shift register

field.name: Address
field.description: I2C device address for slave mode.

field.name: Address
field.description: I2C device address for slave mode.

field.name: Address
field.description: I2C device address for slave mode.

field.name: Data
field.description: This register holds contents of the 8 MSBs of the I2DAT shift register

field.name: RICOMP
field.description: Compare register. Holds the compare value which is compared to the counter.

interpretation.text: The counter value does not equal the masked compare value.
The timer will not be cleared to 0
The timer is halted when the processor is halted for debugging.
Debug has no effect on the timer operation
Day of Month generates an interrupt
Day of Week generates an interrupt
Day of Year generates an interrupt
Second not compared for the alarm
Minutes not compared for the alarm
Hour not compared for the alarm
Day of Month compared for the alarm
Day of Month not compared for the alarm
Day of Week compared for the alarm
Day of Week not compared for the alarm
Day of Year compared for the alarm
Day of Year not compared for the alarm
Month not compared for the alarm
Year not compared for the alarm

field.name: Seconds
field.description: Seconds value in the range of 0 to 59

field.name: Minutes
field.description: Minutes value in the range of 0 to 59

field.name: Hours
field.description: Hours value in the range of 0 to 23

field.name: Day Of Week
field.description: Day of week value in the range of 0 to 6

field.name: Day of Month
field.description: Day of month value in the range of 1 to 28, 29, 30, or 31

field.name: Month
field.description: Month value in the range of 1 to 12

field.name: Year
field.description: Year value in the range of 0 to 4095

field.name: Day of Year
field.description: Day of year value in the range of 1 to 365 or 366

interpretation.text: RTC Oscillator Fail detect interrupt is disabled
RTC Oscillator Fail detect interrupt is enabled

field.name: RTC_OSCF
field.description: RTC Oscillator Fail detect flag - writing a 1 to this bit clears the flag

register.name: LPC_RTC_ALDOM
register.description: Alarm value for Day of Month

register.name: LPC_RTC_ALDOW
register.description: Alarm value for Day of Week

register.name: LPC_RTC_ALDOY
register.description: Alarm value for Day of Year

field.name: Feed
field.description: Feed value should be 0xAA followed by 0x55

register.name: LPC_WDT_WDCLKSEL
register.description: Watchdog Timer Clock Source Selection register

field.name: WDSEL
field.description: These bits select the clock source for the Watchdog timer

interpretation.text: A/D converter is in power-down mode

field.name: START
field.description: When the BURST bit is 0, these bits control whether and when an A/D conversion is started:

interpretation.text: Start conversion when the edge selected by bit 27 occurs on the P2.10 pin
Start conversion when the edge selected by bit 27 occurs on the P1.27 pin
Start conversion when the edge selected by bit 27 occurs on MAT0.1
Start conversion when the edge selected by bit 27 occurs on MAT0.3
Start conversion when the edge selected by bit 27 occurs on MAT1.0
Start conversion when the edge selected by bit 27 occurs on MAT1.1.

field.name: EDGE
field.description: This bit is significant only when the START field contains 010-111.

interpretation.text: Start conversion on a falling edge on the selected CAP/MAT signal
Start conversion on a rising edge on the selected CAP/MAT signal

field.name: CHN
field.description: These bits contain the channel from which the RESULT bits were converted

interpretation.text: channel 0 will not generate an interrupt
channel 1 will not generate an interrupt
channel 2 will not generate an interrupt
channel 3 will not generate an interrupt
channel 4 will not generate an interrupt
channel 5 will not generate an interrupt
channel 6 will not generate an interrupt
channel 7 will not generate an interrupt
Only the global DONE flag in ADDR is enabled to generate an interrupt
Only the individual ADC channels enabled by ADINTEN7:0 will generate interrupts.
One of the individual A/D channel Done

field.name: ADCOFFS
field.description: Offset trim bits for ADC operation

interpretation.text: DAC is 2.5 μs max and the maximum current is 350 μA, 400kHz
DAC is 1 μs max and the maximum current is 700 μA, 1MHz

field.name: VALUE
field.description: 16-bit reload value for the DAC interrupt/DMA timer

interpretation.text: PhA functions as the direction signal and PhB functions as the clock signal
PhA and PhB function as quadrature encoder inputs
BOTH PhA and PhB edges are counted
captured velocity is less than compare velocity
position 0 compare value is equal to the current position
position 1compare value is equal to the current position
position 2 compare value is equal to the current position
index compare value is equal to the current index count

register.name: LPC_CANAF_SFF_sa
register.description: Standard Frame Individual Start Address Register

register.name: LPC_CANAF_SFF_GRP_sa
register.description: Standard Frame Group Start Address Register

register.name: LPC_CANAF_EFF_GRP_sa
register.description: Extended Frame Group Start Address Register

register.name: LPC_CAN1_MOD Controls the operating mode of the CAN Controller
LPC_CAN1_CMR Command bits that affect the state of the CAN Controller
LPC_CAN1_GSR Global Controller Status and Error Counters
LPC_CAN1_ICR Interrupt status, Arbitration Lost Capture, Error Code Capture
LPC_CAN2_MOD Controls the operating mode of the CAN Controller
LPC_CAN2_CMR Command bits that affect the state of the CAN Controller
LPC_CAN2_GSR Global Controller Status and Error Counters
LPC_CAN2_ICR Interrupt status, Arbitration Lost Capture, Error Code Capture

register.description: DMA Software Last Burst Request registe

register.description: DMA Software Last Single Request register

register.name: LPC_GPDMACH0_DMACC0LLI
register.description: DMA Channel 0 Linked List Item Register

register.name: LPC_GPDMACH1_DMACC1LLI
register.description: DMA Channel 1 Linked List Item Register

register.name: LPC_GPDMACH2_DMACC2LLI
register.description: DMA Channel 2 Linked List Item Register

register.name: LPC_GPDMACH3_DMACC3LLI
register.description: DMA Channel 3 Linked List Item Register

register.name: LPC_GPDMACH4_DMACC4LLI
register.description: DMA Channel 4 Linked List Item Register

register.name: LPC_GPDMACH5_DMACC5LLI
register.description: DMA Channel 5 Linked List Item Register

register.name: LPC_GPDMACH6_DMACC6LLI

register.name: LPC_USB_HcRevision
register.description: BCD representation of the version of the HCI specification that is implemented by the Host Controller

register.name: LPC_USB_HcControl
register.description: Defines the operating modes of the HC

register.name: LPC_USB_HcCommandStatus
register.description: This register is used to receive the commands from the Host Controller Driver (HCD). It also indicates the status of the HC

register.name: LPC_USB_HcInterruptStatus
register.description: Indicates the status on various events that cause hardware interrupts by setting the appropriate bits

register.name: LPC_USB_HcInterruptEnable
register.description: Controls the bits in the HcInterruptStatus register and indicates which events will generate a hardware interrupt

register.name: LPC_USB_HcInterruptDisable
register.description: The bits in this register are used to dizable corresponding bits in the HCInterruptStatus register and in turn dizable that event leading to hardware interrupt

register.name: LPC_USB_HcHCCA
register.description: Contains the physical address of the host controller communication area

register.name: LPC_USB_HcPeriodCurrentED
register.description: Contains the physical address of the current isochronous or interrupt endpoint descriptor

register.name: LPC_USB_HcControlHeadED
register.description: Contains the physical address of the first endpoint descriptor of the control list

register.name: LPC_USB_HcControlCurrentED
register.description: Contains the physical address of the current endpoint descriptor of the control list

register.name: LPC_USB_HcBulkHeadED
register.description: Contains the physical address of the first endpoint descriptor of the bulk list

register.name: LPC_USB_HcBulkCurrentED
register.description: Contains the physical address of the current endpoint descriptor of the bulk list

register.name: LPC_USB_HcDoneHead
register.description: Contains the physical address of the last transfer descriptor added to the Done queue

register.name: LPC_USB_HcFmInterval
register.description: Defines the bit time interval in a frame and the full speed maximum packet size which would not cause an overrun

register.name: LPC_USB_HcFmRemaining
register.description: A 14-bit counter showing the bit time remaining in the current frame

register.name: LPC_USB_HcFmNumber
register.description: Contains a 16-bit counter and provides the timing reference among events happening in the HC and the HCD

register.name: LPC_USB_HcPeriodicStart
register.description: Contains a programmable 14-bit value which determines the earliest time HC should start processing a periodic list

register.name: LPC_USB_HcLSTreshold
register.description: Contains 11-bit value which is used by the HC to determine whether to commit to transfer a maximum of 8-byte LS packet before EOF

register.name: LPC_USB_HcRhDescriptorA
register.description: First of the two registers which describes the characteristics of the root hub

register.name: LPC_USB_HcRhDescriptorB
register.description: Second of the two registers which describes the characteristics of the Root Hub

register.name: LPC_USB_HcRhStatus
register.description: This register is divided into two parts. The lower D-word represents the hub status field and the upper word represents the hub status change field

register.name: LPC_USB_HcRhPortStatus1
register.description: Controls and reports the port events on a per-port basis

register.name: LPC_USB_HcRhPortStatus2
register.description: Controls and reports the port events on a per port basis

register.name: LPC_USB_Module_ID
register.description: IP number, where yy (0x00) is unique version number and zz (0x00) is a unique revision number

register.name: LPC_USB_USBEoTIntSt
register.description: USB End of Transfer Interrupt Status

register.name: LPC_USB_USBEoTIntClr
register.description: USB End of Transfer Interrupt Clear
